attributes.action: Reduce street lighting to many can be positioned on streets, help reduce carbon
attributes.background:
We are being constantly bombarded with request to reduce our use of electricity within the home to help with carbon emissions.
However when you walk around your local estates (including motorways), you can clearly see were savings can be made by reducing the amount of street lights in use.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of your local authority and not the UK Government or Parliament.
